name: MV900 + Machine365.Ai Bundle
description: The most powerful configuration: MV900 hardware on each press/forming machine for real-time process monitoring and defect detection, feeding data into Machine365.Ai cloud platform for integrated energy management, AI analytics, and ESG reporting.
synergies: MV900 captures real-time sensor data → Machine365.Ai analyzes trends across all equipment
MV900 detects defects at machine level → Machine365.Ai tracks defect patterns across factory
MV900 monitors press force per unit → Machine365.Ai calculates energy and carbon per product
MV900 enables emergency shutdown → Machine365.Ai provides predictive maintenance to prevent shutdowns

ideal_customer_profile.industry: Metal forming, stamping, forging, pressing, automotive parts, copper/brass fittings
pain_points: High energy costs with no visibility into consumption per product
Frequent defects or mold damage causing production delays
No real-time visibility into equipment status
High maintenance costs from reactive (not predictive) maintenance
